title: Ethan151
author: Ethan151
content: Turn you adversity and suffering to advantages, we have several adversity in bitcoin such as no return, hacking, price volatility, scam and piracy. There are profitable ways we can turn this into adversity Firstly you have to embrace discomfort, discomfort can be very bad but they challenge for growth. You have to be ready to face life challenges and emerge victorious, firstly you must learn from you mistakes and look for a better way to improve, while improving you have to be consistent and consistent comes from the mindset. Without the mind being developed for its outcome of accepting whatever thing that comes up it very difficult. Like a skilled civil Engineer, if he/she doesn’t practice consistency he will not be smart, fast, accurate when laying bricks. Secondly you have to stay away from people who don’t believe in your process, you have to be with people who will encourage you when you When thing are rough. Thirdly take sometime to reflect on your dreams and goal and let them light you to the future.

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Well, the structure of your text makes it a bit unreadable in my opinion.Couldn't it all boil down to educating yourself on the subject and understanding in depth what you're getting into?I don't see how that's any different from any other form of investment, to be honest. As long as you're aware of the risks involved, and understand the subject in depth, it's all a matter of personal decision. Not everyone needs to be "embrace discomfort" to invest in BTC, others are willing to, it's a case by case basis... I don't think it can be used as universal advice.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: This only means that we must be knowledgeable before doing something and don't let other people affect you when you are making a decision. Also experiencing something you want to do before reviewing what you have mistakenly done or what you have to improve and many more. It is more like hands on first rather than just learning through reading without actually doing it. Nothing beats hands on in  a personal work which is vital in learning much faster.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: We all face demanding situations, and Bitcoin has its fair proportion of them too, like no return, hacking, charge swings, scams, and piracy. But howdy, here's the deal - we will flip these setbacks into blessings with the right attitude. Embrace pain because it pushes us to develop. Learn from your mistakes and preserve enhancing.Knowledge is they key to success, isn't it? Just go for that.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: Knowledge is very important before you do anything, Civil engineers must learn years to be skilled in planning, designing, and supervising construction. People who don't believe in the process that you do are people who don't believe in your abilities, show them you can be a motivation for them after you succeed.The purpose of doing something is only to turn dreams into reality, similarly when you are faced with the risk of investing in Bitcoin that you have written above, you must turn this risk into the desired profit in your own way. Need knowledge before entering the Bitcoin market, you must be able to understand technical analysis and fundamental analysis and a safe place to store Bitcoin.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Ethan151 on August 06, 2023, 11:17:09 AMwe have several adversity in bitcoin such as no return, hacking, price volatility, scam and piracy. None of what you mentioned here are problems with Bitcoin;• Hacking happens on exchanges and third party wallets, the security of the Bitcoin network has proven to be very high over the years.• Price volatility encourages speculative trading and is the reason many people who hold Bitcoin today bought it in the first place.• Scam is also not a problem of Bitcoin, you're probably thinking altcoins.• Bitcoin is non-fungible and resistant to piracy.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on August 06, 2023, 06:13:50 PMQuote from: Ethan151 on August 06, 2023, 11:17:09 AMwe have several adversity in bitcoin such as no return, hacking, price volatility, scam and piracy. None of what you mentioned here are problems with Bitcoin;• Hacking happens on exchanges and third party wallets, the security of the Bitcoin network has proven to be very high over the years.• Price volatility encourages speculative trading and is the reason many people who hold Bitcoin today bought it in the first place.• Scam is also not a problem of Bitcoin, you're probably thinking altcoins.• Bitcoin is non-fungible and resistant to piracy.I don't think being autistic and denying reality will help crypto adoption, it just gives a bad image of crypto users, and show them as immature and bigot. It's a fact that it's more risky for the average Joe to hold Bitcoins at home or on an exchange than fiat money at bank. Saying wallets and exchanges have been hacked but the blockchain is still uncracked doesn't mean anything for the average user.The high volatility of Bitcoin is maybe good for trading or gambling but it's bad for using Bitcoin as a mean of payment. And saying scams only happen with altcoins, never with Bitcoin is just a lie.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Living life always brings challenges. There will be things that hurt you, but it's essential to stay focused on your goals and keep moving forward. This holds true for investing in Bitcoin too. There are numerous challenges, particularly during bear markets, which can occur unexpectedly. However, facing these challenges in your own way is crucial to becoming a successful investor. Patience is key in such situations.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: These are all normal challenges that we face in our everyday lives. And the best way to tackle them is to face them and make decisions for ourselves. Set a target and work towards achieving that no matter the hurdles we have to cross to get there. People’s opinion, expectations and concerns don’t matter most times when we need to fight for something to make ourself a better person in the society or with a skill. Bitcoin is not an exception to this, those with the prepared mindset of the future outcome of bitcoin always prevail.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Now a cryptocurrency psychologist has appeared on the forum. OP, your post is very banal. The word "should" is not applicable to a stressed person. Moreover, to say that you have to accept discomfort leads a person even more into despondency.Therefore, writing such posts with dry advice without personal intervention is simply stupid. What does it mean to limit communication with people who do not believe in you? Sometimes these people are relatives.  All motivational texts work until the first personal mistake until the advising person faces his loss.  But how he will deal with it shows his personal strength and advice from the outside, which only generalizes the situation and does lead to anything.In addition, the person who teaches self-control must have a name that can be trusted. What does your name tell us?

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: For investment you not only need self motivation or something like that but you should be doing adequate research on it combining information from different resources because it can be risky if you just went up straight for investment being too confident.The decision should be our owns and made with thorough research that if we loose amount we should be able to handle it and that's where this motivation speech can help not in the initial phase.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Ethan151 on August 06, 2023, 11:17:09 AMTurn you adversity and suffering to advantages, we have several adversity in bitcoin such as no return, hacking, price volatility, scam and piracy.All these are nothing but what we cause to ourselves from the mistakes we do each time we have no understanding of what we are doing, lack of being informed is one of the consequences to what you have listed above, bitcoin has no adversity but through our own self introduced such through the way we handle it.Quote from: Ethan151 on August 06, 2023, 11:17:09 AMThere are profitable ways we can turn this into adversity Firstly you have to embrace discomfort, discomfort can be very bad but they challenge for growth.Let's not make it so appeared that bitcoin has discomfort it gives in other not to discourage others about learning bitcoin, everything about bitcoin depends on learning first and while going through this, you're not meant to experience discomfort to that extent you got discouraged, bitcoin is about freedom and those that seek it finds just as in learning something new.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: If a person had a bad experienced prior to their Bitcoin engagement and was a victim of scams, that person should first learn how to move on and  learn from the incident.  Second, the person should devote time in learning more about Bitcoin while integrating it to prior bad experiences in order to determine what to avoid so that the same bad experience will not happen again.  Education and learning about Bitcoin is one of the best approach in turning bad experiences into something useful.  As we learn about BTC, we will see how we made a mistake in our first encounter and it will serve as a guide in order for us to carefully make decisions in engaging with Bitcoin trades and at the same time securing our BTC holdings.Quote from: Ethan151 on August 06, 2023, 11:17:09 AMSecondly you have to stay away from people who don’t believe in your process, you have to be with people who will encourage you when you When thing are rough. Why stay away, we can just interact with them normally, they might not have the same mindset as us, but we should not distance ourselves to them especially when they are our relatives.  Just learn how to respect each other while staying focus on the goal.

comments.author: Kasabus
comments.body: In general, we should know from the start our goals why we are chasing for bitcoin. If we aim to grow and be as skilled like professionals, then we should acquire knowledge and never stop learning as long as we’re capable to learn. Bitcoin is not just limited to profits only, but also with bitcoin we are taught indirectly how to manage our finances and improve our current financial condition. So just stick to the goal and be consistent in everything that we do to acquire bitcoin, that way all our adversity will shift into bitcoin opportunities.

comments.author: Vaculin
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on August 06, 2023, 12:40:04 PMWe all face demanding situations, and Bitcoin has its fair proportion of them too, like no return, hacking, charge swings, scams, and piracy. But howdy, here's the deal - we will flip these setbacks into blessings with the right attitude. Embrace pain because it pushes us to develop. Learn from your mistakes and preserve enhancing.Knowledge is they key to success, isn't it? Just go for that. Indeed. And when you’ve got knowledge, you will know how to deal all those different demanding situations and make them manageable. Also, never be discouraged from all your mistakes and losses with bitcoin. Remember that before you’ll  achieve your best moment with bitcoin, you will have to face all your struggles first and when you’re done, it’s time for you to reap your rewards. So having positive mindset and being patient too will do a lot of changes in your bitcoin endeavor.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Actually in a normal circumstances the orientation we got from our university done is that we should be independent and also be focused, when we are seeking for something we don't need to be divided or cooperating with people that does not have the same future with us, I believe that is one of things that make some people not to achieve their objectives,  when you are working with same people that have same focus or same vision with you will definitely achieve your objectives, one thing is that you have to know if you want achieve anything you have to work alone until you achieve your objectives, this is my theory and it do work for me.
